Membership:  
It is agreed that after the EMPLOYEE, who by the nature of his  
work comes within the provisions of this Agreement and who  
shall have worked for any EMPLOYER for not less than seven  
(7) days, such EMPLOYEE shall be required to then become

Union shall make membership therein continuously available to

the Union after seven (7) days from the date of commencement  
of work with any EMPLOYER shall, upon written notice from  
the Union, be discharged by his current EMPLOYER.
